page.title: 04BROADFORD FIRE STATION
page.content: The{Broadford Fire Station}was built in 1980 and it is now five years old. {Staisean Smaladh}cost about Â£98 000 to set up and the fire engine fully equipped cost about Â£36 000. There are ten part_time firemen in the Broadford Station. The Broadford Fire Station gets aproximately 50 calls a year and they are called out for other things as well as fires,like road traffic accidents,flooding,spillage of dangerous liquids and heath fires.Most of these things happen in Spring. It costs about Â£10 000 to run the fire engine each year. The Fire Station also provides cover for the Isle of Skye Airstrip. Mr Jack Fraser is the present Firemaster.
